usa: The Sherman Antitrust Act is passed.
Jacob Riis publishes How the Other Half Lives.
The Sherman Silver Purchase Act is passed.
Wounded Knee massacre: The massacre takes place.
The National American Woman Suffrage Association is founded.
australia: The Australian Federation Conference called a constitutional convention.
Banjo Paterson published "The Man from Snowy River"
argentina: Founding of the Radical Civic Union (UCR) or Radical Party
The Panic of 1890 brought the Baring Brothers bank in London close to collapse after disastrous investments in Argentina
